channel.title: Free gold!
channel.description: I beg you to make a script to click this link, I would very appreciate if u do: http://www.FreeGoldStore.com/?referral=2987 u dont have to give away any information (i.e. address, phone, w/e) i get free 500k gold if u do, ill refer u too just pm me

item.title: Free gold!
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

The only reason they give you “free stuff” is because you give them your details such as your address, they sell these details to many people and get more than you get.

Read full topic

item.title: Free gold!
item.dc:creator: @Tech Tech..
item.description:
@Tech wrote:

It’s not a scam, pretty sneaky though.

First they lure you with a great offer (cash). Then they tell you you can get
it with a referral, you think: referral, hmm easy. BUT you can only participate if
you buy one of their ‘special offers’, and the referral needs to buy a ‘special offer’
or he won’t count. In the end 2 'special offers need to be bought for the prize of 500.000,
each special offer would cost 7.50 orso.

Oh wait it may be a scam too, they have no Privacy Police and Terms Of Condition.

Read full topic

item.title: Free gold!

item.description:
@arraness14 wrote:

just click that link or refresh it on it?

begin
repeat
clickmouse(xxx,xxx,true);
wait(xxxx)
until(false)
end.

fill in the x’s and tell me any problems if there are…that was on the spot so yea…by the way thats a refreshing one not a click back wait click* if oyu want me to do somtihng like that tell me.
